alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 07 at 10:20AM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 14 inches...with the highest amounts along with Colorado and New Mexico border. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Las Animas County and Baca County. * WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
